EmailTemplate.name: TurboWest 2015.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Turbofest West 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-west-registration?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbowest_2015&utm_content=invite>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir or Madam}}: It is my pleasure to cordially invite you to VMTurbo’s First Annual Turbofest West <http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-west-registration?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbowest_2015&utm_content=invite> This daylong event will be held Friday, February 13, 2015 at the Omni Hotel in San Francisco – the prior evening, we invite you to join us at the California Academy of Sciences <http://www.calacademy.org/>, to enjoy food, cocktails and live music while mingling with local wild life. This exclusive event features a program of cloud and virtualization thought leadership discussions, customer keynotes, and an inside look at what is in store for VMTurbo in 2015. You can register here <http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-west-registration?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbowest_2015&utm_content=invite>, and a VMTurbo executive will also contact you to address any questions you may have. I hope you will attend this exciting event; it will be one to remember. Sincerely, J. Benjamin H. Nye Chief Executive Officer VMTurbo, Inc.
500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
